verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of praise <WH8426>. Make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto the LORD <WH3068>, all ye lands <WH776>. praise: or, thanksgiving all: Heb. all the earth
Serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> with gladness <WH8057>: come <WH935> before his presence <WH6440> with singing <WH7445>.

Know <WH3045> ye that the LORD <WH3068> he is God <WH430>: it is he that hath made <WH6213> us, and not we ourselves; we are his people <WH5971>, and the sheep <WH6629> of his pasture <WH4830>. and not: or, and his we are
Enter <WH935> into his gates <WH8179> with thanksgiving <WH8426>, and into his courts <WH2691> with praise <WH8416>: be thankful <WH3034> unto him, and bless <WH1288> his name <WH8034>.
For the LORD <WH3068> is good <WH2896>; his mercy <WH2617> is everlasting <WH5769>; and his truth <WH530> endureth to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>. to all: Heb. to generation and generation
